de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientSessionLost


  • public interface IClientSessionLost
    The central module controls the communication with the application server. It's a class where the requests are directly generated and sent.
    was:
    ClientSessionLost.java

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onReconnect(Operator operator)
      Is called if an operator tries to send the request again.
      boolean onSessionLost(Operator operator)
      Is called if the result of a communication with server was an exception.
      void postCaughtSessionLost(Object o)
      If the method preCaughtSessionLost(Operator currentOperator) returns false than this method will be called.
      boolean preCaughtSessionLost(Operator operator)
      Is called after a session has been lost.

    • Method Detail

      • onSessionLost

        boolean onSessionLost(Operator operator)
        Is called if the result of a communication with server was an exception. E.g. session lost, connection problems, database not available, ...
        Parameters:
        operator - the current operator
        Returns:
        true if the dialog about the session lost may be displayed, false otherwise.
        If the dialog is opened the operator can close the client.

      • onReconnect

        boolean onReconnect(Operator operator)
        Is called if an operator tries to send the request again.
        Parameters:
        operator - the current operator
        Returns:
        true if the request may be sent again, false if the client must be closed.

      • preCaughtSessionLost

        boolean preCaughtSessionLost(Operator operator)
        Is called after a session has been lost.
        Parameters:
        operator - the current operator
        Returns:
        true if the session lost message must be ignored (default behavior), false the client attempts to reconnect.

      • postCaughtSessionLost

        void postCaughtSessionLost(Object o)
        If the method preCaughtSessionLost(Operator currentOperator) returns false than this method will be called. An attempt is done to reestablish the connection and the session.
        Parameters:
        Object - - operator object if the operator was offline or Boolean(true) if the operator was online.
